channel.title: Chi Lam Website
channel.description: Recent content on Chi Lam Website

item.title: What are the Different Roles in a Professional PUBG Team?
item.description: This post will soon be updated. In the meantime, the GitHub repository with detail README.md for this project can be found HERE.

item.title: Stock Price Analysis and Prediction
item.description: TL;DR Created an artificial recurrent neural network, a stacked long short-term memory model, to predict HSBC Bank stock prices to make better buying/ selling decisions with root mean square error of 34.503. I also applied different logic into the model to make it predict the next 30 days of stock prices. I used Python to perform feature engineer and technical analysis on the stock. This post is used as a quick overview of the project.

item.title: Improved Product Review System
item.description: TL;DR Improved the traditional product review system through text sentimental analysis and Natural Language Processing with a 63.96% accuracy score (using Log regression) and all AUC values above 0.75. By taking only the customer review comments of an Amazonâ€™s product as input, I created a sentiment detection algorithm to rate the product based on its comment. I also included topic modeling in this project to detect the general topics of what the reviews are about.

item.title: Predicting Boston Property Price
item.description: Introduction Predict Boston property price by analyzing data scraped from trulia.com using advanced regression models. I will go in-depth for all the processes of this project: from using Beautiful Soup to scrape data, to analyze and compare different regression models, and building an Application Programming Interface (API) using a micro web framework in Python: Flask. For in-depth step-by-step code analysis, the repository for this project can be found here. My goal for this project is to use the best regression model to predict Boston housing prices on Trulia based on the number of features that the source provides.

item.title: A Country GDP Vs. Its Fertility and Mortality Rates
item.description: I want to see whether there is a relationship between a country’s GDP and its fertility and mortality rates. With the assumption: higher GDP corresponds with lower fertility and mortality rates, I will use data from World Bank Group to analyze using a regression model. I recreated this project from my CMSE class but improved it by applying a fundamental data science project’s outline. For in-depth step-by-step code analysis, the repository for this project can be found here.
